did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Microfilm of 38 diaries authored by Bradley which span the years 1816-1876.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Microfilm of 38 diaries authored by Bradley which span the years 1816-1876 (1819, 1823-25, 1831-32, 1842, 1848-49, 1851-52, 1856, and 1874 are not represented). Most cover one year's time in daily entries of about 10 to 20 pages for each diary.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Samuel Beach Bradley diaries, #6208. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: An alphabetically arranged listing of proper names in Dr. Bradley's diaries is located in the Samuel Beach Bradley Papers, #733.
